oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of highly functionalised dibenzylglycine derivatives via the Suzuki-Miyaura coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, SAMBASIVARAO
BEHERA, MANORANJAN
VINOD KUMAR, RAMANATHAM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dibenzylglycine derivatives
suzuki-miyaura coupling reaction
ethyl isocyanoacetate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several α,α-dibenzylglycine (α-benzylphenylalanine) derivatives were prepared by alkylation of the ethyl isocyanoacetate with different benzyl bromide derivatives. Various aryl groups were introduced in the dibenzylglycine moiety via the Suzuki–Miyaura coupling reaction.
